description: A nice day hike. The trail is often wet in the spring and can get mucky in areas after a rainfall. It is a well defined trail to the lake which is very clear and picturesque.
directions: At the Mahood Lake Provincial Park campground continue north on the main road towards the Canim river. Immediately after crossing the river you will see the trail marker on the left. The is a small parking area.
title: Whale Lake
